name: leantime
description: Leantime is an open-source project management system designed for teams and startups. It combines lean methodology with strategic planning, task management, idea boards, and reportingâ€”all in a modern self-hosted web UI.
features: Project Management: Task tracking, Milestone planning, Team collaboration. Manage projects with lean methodology.
Strategic Planning: Goal setting, Idea boards, Roadmap visualization. Align team efforts with strategy.
Time Tracking: Log work hours, Project time reports, Resource allocation. Track time spent on tasks.
Reporting: Progress dashboards, Analytics, Custom reports. Monitor project health and team performance.
